text: Armageddon (2005) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It took place on December 18, 2005 at the Dunkin' Donuts Center in Providence, Rhode Island. It was the sixth Armageddon event held by WWE. There were eight matches on for the event's card. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Jamie Noble defeated Funaki. Singles match 03:30 2 John "Bradshaw" Layfield (with Jillian Hall) defeated Matt Hardy. Singles match 06:44 3 MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro) (with Melina) defeated The Mexicools (Super Crazy and Psicosis). Tag team match 08:55 4 Chris Benoit defeated Booker T (with Sharmell) by submission. Match 4 in a "Best of 7" series for the vacant WWE United States Championship 20:09 5 Bobby Lashley defeated William Regal and Paul Burchill. Handicap match 03:38 6 Kid Kash defeated Juventud (c). Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 09:25 7 Kane and Big Show defeated Rey Mysterio and Batista. Tag team match 08:37 8 The Undertaker defeated Randy Orton (with "Cowboy" Bob Orton). Hell in a Cell match 30:31 ==Related pages== *WWE Armageddon *List of WWE pay-per-view events ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Armageddon 2005 website Category:2005 in professional wrestling Category:History of Providence, Rhode Island Category:WWE Armageddon Category:2005 in the United States Category:2000s in Rhode Island
title: Armageddon (2005)
